m_szDocSumamry: News:2013:Electromagnetic Jump to: navigation , search Electromagnetic (Overunity) in the News, 2013 News relating to Electromagnetic overunity systems which apparently or allegedly put out more electrical charge than when is put in, somehow harness energy from the environment in the process. Current News:Electromagnetic - most recent news 2013 Top FE Inventor Updates - In getting ready for tonight's interview on Coast to Coast AM, I send out an email last night to the inventors whose technology I hope to at least mention, asking them if they have any updates they can provide. (Free Energy Blo
